attributes.rationale: On when external monitor is connected, on AC power, at home, and connectivity is either a known home Wi-Fi SSID or Ethernet (current/recent).
True if connection is Ethernet OR Wi-Fi on a known home SSID. When it turns off, it decays after 120s (delay_off) to smooth brief link changes.

attributes.composite_logic: recent OR detected AND NOT end

attributes.description: A companion sensor that exposes the raw score for diagnostics or visualization (e.g., in a gauge card).
Determines bed presence based on whether any sleep stage duration is greater than zero.
Summary state combining modular sleep and location sensors.
Classifies sleep score into quality tiers.

attributes.aggregation_strategy: probabilistic score with time-decay and jitter suppression
attributes.description: A binary sensor that uses a probabilistic score with time-decay and jitter suppression, derived from current sensor states, recent history, and possibly other heuristics.
Determines if Evert is currently in bed based on any non-zero sleep phase durations.
Assesses if Evert is asleep based on a sleep probability score threshold.
Tracks if Evert is currently at the Home location.
Average humidity across all rooms in the home excluding soil moisture sensors
Merged humidity value from multiple bedroom humidity sensors - uses average of available values
Merged humidity value from living room alpha humidity sensor
Merged humidity value from kitchen alpha humidity sensor
Merged humidity value from ensuite alpha humidity sensor

attributes.rationale: Decay illuminance score when TV engaged, persists lighting effects for a short period.
attributes.description: Decay sensor for lighting persistence based on TV engagement.

Standardized illuminance reading for bedroom from merged alpha sensor
Maximum illuminance detected in any room of the home

Aggregated occupancy state for hallways

Aggregated occupancy for main upstairs areas

Resolves person.evert's state to the friendly name of a zone entity, or 'Away' if outside all zones.

attributes.description: Calculates time delta from current time to alarm time
Normalized reachability status inferred from Tailscale funnel probe
Counts the number of entities currently in an 'unavailable' state from a predefined group
This sensor tracks the status of the bedroom television (media_player.bedroom_tv_alpha) and returns labels such as 'Playing', 'Paused', or 'Stopped'.

attributes.rationale: Emits all connected displays as a comma-separated string; use in fusion or decision logic.
attributes.description: \"A single active displays sensor gives you the ground truth for all your display-based logic, and can serve as the universal input for higher-tier logic, automations, and UI.\"

attributes.rationale: Tracks which TV app is currently active for scene/automation logic.
attributes.description: Abstraction for current app/channel running on Bedroom TV.

attributes.rationale: Diagnostic telemetry sensor for PS4 media_player state and attributes.
attributes.description: \"Diagnostic sensor to expose raw PS4 media_player state and key attributes for troubleshooting and validation of higher-tier logic sensors.\"
Binary: on when PS4 is playing a game; off otherwise. (Labels are provided by separate sensors.)
True when PS4 is actively running a game (media_player state playing + type game).
Presence-style engagement signal derived from PS4 game activity (with 5 min decay).

attributes.rationale: Engaged when TV is on and running a known app (not just powered on).
attributes.description: Gamma-tier entertainment state: TV is on and in use for media.

attributes.rationale: On if TV reports 'on' or draws significant power (>5W).
attributes.description: -tier abstraction for bedroom TV on-state, combines media_player and power for reliability.
